There is no place for animal cruelty in the United States. That is why I'm proud to have taken action w/ my colleagues from both sides of the aisle to pass the PAST Act to ensure that the inhumane practice of soring horses does not occur. https://twitter.com/HumaneSociety/status/1154456599311708160 …

The bipartisan agreement to #RaiseTheCaps gives us the chance to make critical investments in our schools, infrastructure, veterans & more. Read about this deal in my release here. https://cisneros.house.gov/media/press-releases/rep-cisneros-statement-passage-bipartisan-budget-act …

I am proud to have voted in support of H.R. 3239 this week, which would establish much needed medical standards & care for children & families at the border. I've talked to so many constituents in #CA39 about our nation’s crumbling infrastructure. That’s why my colleagues and I in the @NewDemCoalition sent a letter to the President to find a bipartisan solution for our infrastructure. It’s time for action to improve Americans' lives. pic.twitter.com/C6ZTz1BH2o

Robocalls are frustrating & most are illegal–that’s why we took bipartisan action in the House today to pass the #StopBadRobocalls Act. Americans deserve a break & this bill takes meaningful steps toward stopping these billions of calls. pic.twitter.com/zsNfDHG8Xx

Millions of Americans have served their country honorably in the military but cannot join the American Legion because they served during undeclared conflicts. My colleagues & I passed the #LEGION Act so all veterans can obtain membership & earn the benefits they deserve. https://twitter.com/RepLouCorrea/status/1153811692989505538 …

I was proud to support #Renew911VCF in the House, & just yesterday, it passed in the Senate. Our 9/11 heroes risked everything to serve our nation during tragic times & they deserve no less than receiving the compensation to help them & their families. https://www.washingtonpost.com/national-security/senate-votes-to-extend-911-victims-fund-for-first-responders-whove-become-sick-since-2001-attacks/2019/07/23/c9fda47e-ad68-11e9-a0c9-6d2d7818f3da_story.html?utm_term=.19ffdc27c1d3 …

Special thank you to Chairman @RepMarkTakano Ranking Member @DrPhilRoe my colleague and fellow veteran @RepHoulahan and all the Members on @VetAffairsDems @HouseVetAffairs for their support of these important bills.

These are commonsense bills that will help modernize the VA and eliminate barriers to the benefits our servicemembers and veterans have earned and deserve. I urge my colleagues in the Senate to take urgent action on these bills, our nation's heroes deserve nothing less.

BREAKING: I'm proud to announce that the House voted unanimously on a bipartisan basis to pass my first bills H.R. 2942, the HEALTH for Women Veterans Act and H.R. 2943 the Providing Benefits Information in Spanish and Tagalog for Veterans & Families Act. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7UxgNkdtRqE&#t=05m10s …

Americans need a #LivingWage it's good for our families & businesses alike. That's why I joined my colleagues in supporting the #RaiseTheWageAct to create a $15hr wage by 2024.
